title: How to install FTGL and related freetype libraries on Windows
body:
I am using FTGL libraries for my code written in C++ on Windows platform. I have installed cygwin and able to run my code via g++.

But I am getting trouble while using ftgl headers. I have just copied the ftgl source files on to my system and linked the path while compiling.

But now the compiler throws this error " fatal error: freetype/config/ftheader.h: No such file"

How can I install FTGL and related libraries like freetype on Windows.

this questionis same but there is no proper answer so I had to reask.
